approach: Differential Evolution global optimization for small N

N=3.note: DE found WORSE solution than baseline

conclusion: Differential Evolution global optimization found WORSE solutions than baseline for N=3,4,5. The baseline is at an EXTREMELY STRONG LOCAL OPTIMUM that even global optimization methods cannot beat. After 24 experiments, ALL approaches fail to improve.
